# NEVPNIKEAuthenticationMethod.certificate

**Case**

Use a certificate and private key as the authentication credential. The certificate and private key set in the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocol/identityReference] or [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocol/identityData] property will be used.

## Declaration

```swift
case certificate
```

## Authentication methods

- **NEVPNIKEAuthenticationMethod.none**: Do not authenticate with the IPSec server. Note that extended authentication may still be performed if the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocolIPSec/useExtendedAuthentication] property is set. This value is only valid for IKE version 2 (IKEv2)
- **NEVPNIKEAuthenticationMethod.sharedSecret**: Use a shared secret as the authentication credential. The shared secret set in the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNProtocolIPSec/sharedSecretReference] property will be used.
